title: World's Most Powerful Passports: India On 82nd Position, Lets You Travel 59 Countries Visa-Free
text:
It’s been a close competition for countries to be named in as one having the most powerful passport, with two countries - both Asian - tying for the top spot. Japan and Singapore are in the first place, according to Henley Passport Index.

The study was conducted by Henley & Partners, that says passports of the top two countries allow free visa-on-arrival to 190 countries. The countries across the world have been rated depending on the number of countries the passport holder of a particular country can have access to, without requiring to get a visa before travel.

South Korea, Finland and Germany are on the second place. The European countries Denmark, Italy and Luxembourg hold the third place in the index. France, Spain and Sweden occupied the fourth place.

India has been ranked 82 on the index, as the Indian passport holders can access 59 countries around the world without having prior visa. India shares its position with no other country.

Don't Miss 318 SHARES 324 SHARES

Henley Passport Index

The best passports to hold in 2019 are:

Japan, Singapore (190 destinations) Finland, Germany, South Korea (188) Denmark, Italy, Luxembourg (187) France, Spain, Sweden (186) Austria, Netherlands, Portugal (185) Belgium, Canada, Greece, Ireland, Norway, United Kingdom, United States, Switzerland (184) Malta, Czech Republic (183) New Zealand (182) Australia, Lithuania, Slovakia (181) Hungary, Iceland, Latvia, Slovenia (180)

Afghanistan is last on the list. Henley & Partner's list is one of several indexes created by financial firms to rank global passports according to the access they provide to their citizens.
description: It’s been a close competition for countries to be named as one of the most powerful passports, with both top countries from Asia. Yes, Japan and Singapore are on the first place, according to Henley Passport Index. The study was conducted by Henley & Partners that says passports of these countries allow free visa-on-arrival to 190 countries.
